title: Doctor Who - Loose Cannon - Reconstructions of Lost Episodes
description:
Doctor Who - Loose Cannon - Reconstructions of Lost Episodes

These are reconstructions of all missing episodes of Doctor Who from the 1960s, as of 2016.  They were created by Loose Cannon (https://web.archive.org/web/20140623101539/http://www.recons.com/).

The files were downloaded from Dailymotion and are better quality than the Youtube versions.  This upload is intended to replace the one from 2013 because this is better quality.

Also includes:
 â€¢ New improved reconstruction of "The Massacre" (LC40).
 â€¢ Bonus ebook "The Lost Lords of Time" Vol 1 and 2.
 â€¢ Extras and interviews.

Included are recons from the following serials:

Marco Polo (Color) (LC17)
Marco Polo (LC39)
The Reign of Terror (LC37)
The Crusade (LC33)
Galaxy Four (LC11)
Mission to the Unknown (LC13)
The Myth Makers (LC26)
The Daleks' Master Plan (LC20)
The Massacre (LC40)
The Celestial Toymaker (LC36)
The Savages (LC29)
The Smugglers (LC30)
The Tenth Planet (LC04)
The Power of the Daleks (LC10)
The Highlanders (LC27)
The Underwater Menace (LC23)
The Moonbase (LC18)
The Macra Terror (LC24)
The Faceless Ones (LC32)
The Evil of the Daleks (LC31)
The Abominable Snowmen (LC25)
The Ice Warriors (LC21)
Fury from the Deep (LC22)
The Wheel in Space (LC34)
The Invasion (LC19)
The Space Pirates (LC28)

DVDs required to fill gaps with existing episodes:

 â€¢ "Lost in Time" DVD box set contains existing episodes for most of the serials.
 â€¢ "The Reign of Terror" DVD contains animated episodes 4 and 5.
 â€¢ "Galaxy 4" episode 3 "Air Lock" was released on "The Aztecs" special edition DVD in 2013.
 â€¢ "The Tenth Planet" DVD contains animated episode 4.
 â€¢ "The Power of the Daleks" was animated in November 2016.
 â€¢ "The Underwater Menace" DVD contains snapshot reconstructions of episodes 1 and 4 by the BBC.
 â€¢ "The Moonbase" DVD contains animated episodes 1 and 3.
 â€¢ "The Ice Warriors" DVD contains animated episodes 2 and 3.
 â€¢ "The Invasion" DVD contains animated episodes 1 and 4
